topic.title: Why ZeroNet has so few users?
topic.body: Why ZeroNet has so few users? It exists for more than 4 years, yet there are around only 1000 users online (judging from the number of peers seeding ZeroHello) What can we do to make it more mainstream?

1566538598_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsK.body: They have access to computers, yet there are problems with freedom of speech there.

1566704216_1GDtf6kkYiCtruw42QmAeaHG1HsrW.body: White House does not care about terrorists in general, only about those who are inconvenient to them. They are best pals with Saudi Arabia after all.

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Can't update. I update, but it's still on 0.6.5. Why?

1575167083_13wJrWgzjwKU1zgXJMDCGhkSjsaUv.body:
Religion is the sigh of the oppressed creature, the heart of a heartless world, and the soul of soulless conditions. It is the opium of the people.
- Karl Marx

1577153543_17bfQv5PQW9FZ4akChr7ECfqP2SKu.body: If God really existed, it would be necessary to abolish Him.
